result.schema:
schema {
	query: Query
	mutation: Mutation	
}

type Query {
	getRecordProducer(sysId: String!,  requireTableMatch: Boolean): RecordProducerResult
	getTopics(taxonomy: String, pageSize: Int, offset: Int, parentTopic: String, searchTerm: String, topLevel: Boolean): TopicsResult
	getTemplates(pageSize: Int, offset: Int, searchTerm: String): TemplatesResult
	getText2CatalogInfo: Text2CatalogInfoResult
}


type Mutation {
	updateRecordProducer(sysId: String!, payload: UpdateRecordProducerPayload!): RecordProducerResult
	saveQuestion(payload: QuestionPayload!): QuestionResult
	saveContainer(payload: ContainerPayload!): ContainerResult
	saveQuestionSet(payload: QuestionSetPayload!): QuestionSetResult
	reorderQuestions(payload: ReorderPayload!): ReorderResult
	publishRecordProducer(sysId: String!, options: PublishOptions): PublishRecordProducerResult
	cancelCheckoutRecordProducer(sysId: String!): CancelCheckoutRecordProducerResult
	checkoutRecordProducer(sysId: String!): CheckoutRecordProducerResult
	generateAndPersistRequestForm(payload: AiPayload!): GenerateAndPersistRequestFormResult
}

union RecordProducerResult = RecordProducer | Error
union QuestionResult = Question | Error
union ContainerResult = ContainerResponse | Error
union QuestionSetResult = QuestionSetResponse | Error
union ReorderResult = Variables | Error
union PublishRecordProducerResult = PublishedRecordProducer | Error
union CancelCheckoutRecordProducerResult = CancelRecordProducerResult | Error
union CheckoutRecordProducerResult = CheckedOutRecordProducer | Error
union TopicsResult = Topics | Error
union TemplatesResult = Templates | Error
union Text2CatalogInfoResult = Text2CatalogInfo | Error
union GenerateAndPersistRequestFormResult = AiResponse | Error

input AiPayload {
	targetRPTable: String,
	catalogItemDescription: String,
	wizardId: String,
	templateId: String,
	isTemplateMandatory: Boolean,
	parentRecordTable: String,
	parentRecordId: String,
	mode: String,
	sysparm_item_guid: String,
	sysparm_edit_mode: String,
	sysparm_target_id: String,
	parent_params: ParentParams,
	additional_params: [NameValuePair],
	variables: [NameValuePair]
}

input ParentParams {
	sysparm_parent_table: String,
	sysparm_parent_sys_id: String
}

input NameValuePair {
	name: String,
	value: String
}

type AiResponse {
	cat_item_id: String
}

type Text2CatalogInfo {
	isText2CatalogSetUp: Boolean,
	isUserNowAssistCreator: Boolean,
}

input UpdateRecordProducerPayload {
	name: String,
	shortDescription: String,
	description: String,
	picture: String,
	hideAttachment: String,
	attachmentMandatory: String,
	createDefaultQuestions: Boolean,
}

type Error {
	message: String!,
	errorType: String!
}

type Topic {
	name: String,
	topicPath: String,
	sysId: String,
	parentTopic: String,
	taxonomy: String,
	hasChildren: Boolean
}

type Topics {
	topics: [Topic],
	offset: Int,
	pageSize: Int
}

type Template {
	sysId: String,
	shortDescription: String,
	catItem: String,
	name: String,
	useTemplateScope: Boolean,
	availableFor: String
}

type Templates {
	_rowCount: Int,
	templates: [Template],
}

type RecordProducer {
	sysId: String @source(value: "sys_id"),
	shortDescription: String @source(value: "short_description"),
	picture: String,
	icon: String,
	description: String,
	type: String,
	sysClassName: String @source(value: "sys_class_name"),
	contentType: String @source(value: "content_type"),
	name: String,
	variables: [Variable],
	scTemplateId: String
	scTemplateLabel: String
	publishedRef: String
	publishedSysUpdatedOn: String @source(value: "published_sys_updated_on")
	publishedSysUpdatedBy: String @source(value: "published_sys_updated_by")
	attachmentMandatory: String @source(value: "mandatory_attachment")
	hideAttachment: String
	state: String @source(value: "state")
	stateValue: String
	formImageUrl: String
}

type PublishedRecordProducer {
	sysId: String
}

type CheckedOutRecordProducer {
	sysId: String
}

input PublishOptions {
	active: Boolean
}

type CancelRecordProducerResult {
	success: Boolean
}

type UiPolicy {
	sysId: String
	shortDescription: String
	catalogConditions: String
	appliesCatalog: Boolean
	appliesReqItem: Boolean
	appliesScTask: Boolean
	actions: [UiPolicyAction]
}

type UiPolicyAction {
	catalogItem: String
	catalogVariable: String
	cleared: String
	disabled: String
	displayValue: String
	field: String
	fieldMessage: String
	fieldMessageType: String
	mandatory: String
	order: Int
	sysId: String
	uiPolicy: String
	value: String
	valueAction: String
	visible: String
}

type Variable {
	active: Boolean
	label: String
	type: Int
	mandatory: Boolean
	displayValue: String @source(value: "displayvalue")
	friendlyType: String @source(value: "friendly_type")
	displayType: String @source(value: "display_type")
	renderLabel: Boolean @source(value: "render_label")
	readOnly: Boolean @source(value: "read_only")
	name: String
	attributes: String
	id: String
	choices: [Choice]
	value: String
	helpText: String @source(value: "help_text")
	instructions: String @source(value: "instructions")
	maxLength: Int @source(value: "max_length")
	order: Int
	children: [Variable]
	containerType: String
	columnCount: Int
	containerSplitId: ID
	containerEndId: ID
	hasSplit: Boolean
	hidden: Boolean @source(value: "hidden")
	includeNone: Boolean @source(value: "include_none")
	validateRegex: String @source(value: "validate_regex")
	doNotSelectFirst: Boolean @source(value: "do_not_select_first")
	reference: String
	referenceQual: String @source(value: "reference_qual")
	table: String
	lookupTable: String @source(value: "lookup_table")
	lookupValue: String @source(value: "lookup_value")
	lookupLabel: String @source(value: "lookup_label")
	uiPolicies: [UiPolicy] @source(value: "ui_policies")
	dynamicValueDotWalkPath: String @source(value: "dynamic_value_dot_walk_path")
	dynamicValueField: DynamicValueField @source(value: "dynamic_value_field")
}

type DynamicValueField {
	value: String @source(value: "value")

}

type Choice {
	recurringPriceCurrency: String @source(value: "recurring_price_currency"),
	price: Float,
	index: Int,
	recurringPrice: Float @source(value: "recurring_price"),
	label: String,

	priceCurrency: String @source(value: "price_currency")
}

	index: Int,
	label: String!,
	value: String!
}

type Question {
	sysId: ID @source(value: "sys_id")
	questionText: String @source(value: "question_text")
	helpText: String @source(value: "help_text")
	instructions: String @source(value: "instructions")
	mapToField: Boolean @source(value: "map_to_field")
	displayTitle: Boolean @source(value: "display_title")
	includeNone: Boolean @source(value: "include_none")
	validateRegex: String @source(value: "validate_regex")
	active: Boolean

	type: String
	name: String
	order: String
	layout: String
	attributes: String
	choices: [Choice]
	readOnly: Boolean
	hidden: Boolean

	lookupTable: String
	lookupValue: String
	lookupLabel: String

	type: String,
	catItem: String,
	sysId: ID,
	questionText: String,
	helpText: String,
	instructions: String,
	mapToField: Boolean,
	displayType: String,
	displayTitle: Boolean,
	id: ID,
	active: Boolean,
	name: String,
	order: String,
	layout: String,
	attributes: String,

	field: String,
	choices: [ChoiceInput]

}

type Container {
	sysId: ID @source(value: "sys_id"),
	questionText: String @source(value: "question_text"),
	displayTitle: Boolean @source(value: "display_title"),
	active: Boolean,
	mandatory: Boolean,
	type: String,
	name: String,

type ContainerResponse {
	containerStart: Container @source(value: "containerStart")
	containerEnd: Container @source(value: "containerEnd")

	type: String,

type DiagramAction {

}

type ShapePropertyData {

type ShapeProperty {

}

type JSONString {

type InstanceData {

}

type BuilderActions {

	id:String!
	componentTagName:String!
	enable:Boolean!

}

type Palette {

	runActionById(actionId: String!,diagramJSON: String!,instanceId: String!):[BuilderActions]

type Category {

type Shape {

type ActionArguments{

	name:String!
	defaultValue:String!
	direction:String!
	type:String!

	mandatory:Boolean!
	actionId:String!
	actionName:String!
}

schema {
	query : Query
	mutation : Mutation
}

type Query {
	segmentById(
		segment_id : String!
	) : SegmentResult

	segmentByAgentAndInteraction(
		agent_id : String! 
		interaction_id : String! 
	) : SegmentResult
}

type Mutation {
	createSegment(
		agent_sys_id : String!
		interaction_sys_id : String!
		opened_on : String
		wrap_up_configuration_sys_id : String
		external : Boolean!
		segmented : Boolean!
		external_segment_id : String
		configuration : Configuration
	) : SegmentResult

	updateSegment(
		segment_sys_id : String
		agent_sys_id : String
		interaction_sys_id : String
		external_segment_id : String
		wrap_up_code : String
		notes : String
		confirmed_on : String
	) : SegmentResult
}
# params in snake_case for configuration to be in sync with rest api
input Configuration {
	allowed_codes : [AllowedCodes]
	default_code  : String
	duration : String
	show_timer : Boolean 
}

input AllowedCodes {
	code : String
	translation : [Translation]
	description : String
}

input Translation {
	language : String
	code : String
	description : String
}

type WrapUpCode {
	code : String
	description : String
	active : Boolean
	external: Boolean
	sys_id : String
	translated_code : String
	translated_description : String
}

type WrapUpConfiguration {
	name : String
	sys_id : String
	enforce_duration : Boolean
	duration : String
	show_timer : Boolean
	conditions : String
	enable_codes : Boolean
	allowed_codes : [WrapUpCode]
	default_code : WrapUpCode
	external : Boolean
}

type Segment {
	sys_id : String
	agent : String
	interaction : String
	opened_on : String
	wrap_up_configuration : WrapUpConfiguration

	external : Boolean
	segmented : Boolean
	external_segment_id : String
	segment_table : String
	segment_id : String

	state : String
	wrap_up_code : WrapUpCode
	notes : String	

	submitted_on : String
	awaiting_confirmation : Boolean
	confirmed_on : String
	timed_out : Boolean
}

type SegmentResult {
	message : String
	success : Boolean
	segment : Segment
}

	payload: String
